hero.title: Your {mate} Helping You Become Australian.
hero.subtitle: Pass the Australian Citizenship Test with confidence. Gamified learning, AI voice tutoring, and personalized prep that feels like playing a game.

features.title: Why PassMate?
features.subtitle: We've transformed the dry, anxiety-inducing test preparation process into an addictive, gamified learning journey.

f1.title: Daily Streaks
f1.desc: Stay motivated with daily streaks and never miss a day of learning.

f2.title: Weekly Leagues
f2.desc: Compete with other learners and climb from Bronze to Diamond.

f3.title: Mock Exam Simulator
f3.desc: Real 45-minute timed exams with official passing scores.

f4.title: 80% Pass Guarantee
f4.desc: We are so confident in our method that we guarantee your success.
